stimulusHtml: Which of the following can replace  /* missing code */  so that the code segment will work as intended?

features.html:
The following code segment is intended to set the array  numbers  to  {10, 20, 30, 40}.

 

int[] numbers = new int[4]; 
/* missing code */

choicesHtml:
int x = 10; 
for (int value : numbers) 
{ 
   value = x; 
   x += 10; 
}

for (int j = 0; j < numbers.length; j++) 
{ 
   numbers[j] = j * 10; 
}

numbers[0] = 10; 
for (int j = 0; j <numbers.length; j++) 
{ 
   numbers[j] = numbers[j] + 10; 
}

numbers[3] = 40; 
for (int j = numbers.length - 1; j > 0; j--) 
{ 
   numbers[j - 1] = numbers[j] – 10; 
}
